summary: REQ-1 typography update appears implemented by loading Inter in frontend/index.html, configuring Tailwind fontFamily.sans, and applying font-sans to the global body styles in frontend/src/index.css. No evidence in the diff indicates edits to the listed immutable frontend paths. However, the diff also includes unrelated metadata/state changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state updates unrelated to the typography request (adding new_feature_requests entries AR-1/AR-2 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for typography changes; it does not request modifying project_state.json or adding feature-request tracking entries.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to a repository summary/metadata file describing many new routes/hooks/features (e.g., blocked account help pages, evidence audio/video support, stubbed backend hooks), which are outside the typography-only scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly say not to add new features beyond typography changes; while this file is a summary, its update is not requested and documents substantial unrelated feature work.
